data.message: You're a such great person EM i'm so proud with you for reason that I don't know you've been fighting for a long time fighting your self about what is right and what is wrong and you've find your you've made you own world voice style and the more important the new you so what to tell i'm just 14 ans and my life is going so bed but always hopeful and walking on your step to find the real me and discover what I really want to be so you know ... Thank you man !
